content: a hat that honors the state flag of minnesota this pattern fits an average head size of 20-22 circ and uses two shades of blue this pattern wouldn t be complete without a white pompom to represent l étoile du nord our shining north star best colors for this hat are cascade superwash 220 merino in #49 hawaiian blue and #33 navy this pattern is free for a limited time and patrons are asked to donate to a food shelf helping those who cannot help themselves is the minnesota way
